[ library(fd) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

dvar_domain(+DVar, -Dom)

Dom is the domain of the domain variable DVar.
+DVar
A domain variable.
-Dom
A variable.

Description

Dom is the domain of the domain variable DVar. If DVar is instantiated, Dom is bound to a singleton domain.

Fail Conditions

None.

Resatisfiable

No.

See Also

dvar_attribute / 2, :: / 2, #:: / 2
